text: Morning, team. <@U0260V1BX> how goes ux/design? I'd like to find a time today for us all to go through it together. (We have time to share with client tomorrow at 9am.)
Agreed. I have Samsung in house today, though admit I don't know their timeline. Last week they were out by 3pm. Point being — my NO MEETINGS day may open up a bit
At a dr's appt, be in in 30min or so. Happy to do a check in after lunch
Cool. I just put some time on at 1pm. David, if you can get together then, awesome. Otherwise let's plan to have you and Melissa when you have a free moment.
Hi friends. I've snagged the big room up front when you're ready.
The update: Melissa took us through ux/design. She will send out a PDF at the end of the day. I'll post that PDF for immersion tomorrow morning prior to the call.
<@U0265G76F> and <@U0260V4K1> -- can you both catch up with Melissa to take a look when you are able?
Team, I'm heading out -- will be out of the office for the rest of the day.
Let's all take a look at the updates when Melissa sends. And then we'll meet here for the 9am call tomorrow morning.
And do let me know if you need anything in the meantime. 503 688 0962
